code:
%%{Retail_OrderManagement}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User as User Browser
    participant API as Drogon API Pod
    participant DB as PostgreSQL

    Note over User, API: 1. Registration
    User->>API: POST /register
    API->>API: Hash password
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO users
    DB-->>API: Returns User ID
    API-->>User: 201 Created {Retail_PointOfSale}

    Note over User, API: 2. Create Short Link
    User->>API: POST /shorten (Retail_OrderManagement)
    API->>API: Validate & Generate Code
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO links
    DB-->>API: OK
    API-->>User: 201 Created {Retail_CouponSystem}

    Note over User, API: 3. Redirect
    User->>API: GET /{Retail_OrderManagement}
    API->>DB: SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...
    DB-->>API: Return Destination URL
    API-->>User: 302 Found (Retail_Inventory)

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_OrderManagement 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_OrderManagement'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_Inventory。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_Inventory'，你看看合适吗？
